<title>Born in the U.S.A. | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="Springsteen's Born in the U.S.A. album placed him firmly on the pop charts with seven Top Ten singles and turned him into a global superstar." />

<meta property="og:title" content="Born in the U.S.A." />
<meta property="og:description" content="Critical meets commercial success. Springsteen's seventh studio album placed him firmly on the pop charts with seven Top Ten singles and turned him into a global superstar. The title track is self-described as one of his best songs. Reasonably regarded as the turning-point album in Bruce's career." />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://brucespringsteen.net/albums/born-in-the-u-s-a/" />

yoast_head_json.title: Born in the U.S.A. | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: Springsteen's Born in the U.S.A. album placed him firmly on the pop charts with seven Top Ten singles and turned him into a global superstar.
yoast_head_json.og_description: Critical meets commercial success. Springsteen's seventh studio album placed him firmly on the pop charts with seven Top Ten singles and turned him into a global superstar. The title track is self-described as one of his best songs. Reasonably regarded as the turning-point album in Bruce's career.
yoast_head_json.twitter_description: Critical meets commercial success. Springsteen's seventh studio album placed him firmly on the pop charts with seven Top Ten singles and turned him into a global superstar. The title track is self-described as one of his best songs. Reasonably regarded as the turning-point album in Bruce's career.
